name: PlayAnimation

arguments.name: weight
arguments.desc: Weight [0,1] of this animation, default is 1.0

arguments.name: filter
arguments.desc: Name of the bone and its subtree that will be affected

returns.name: handle
returns.desc: Handle to the instance that can be used with PlayAnimationInstance, zero if clip reached its end

examples: --This will play a single animation "Shooting" with a 80% influence but only on the skeleton starting at bone "Spine"
description: Single animations, one-shot, will be processed after looping animations.
